  2. Mexican mayor's severed head placed atop pickup truck 6 days after taking office  Fox News
  3. Mayor of city in Mexico killed in apparent decapitation  USA TODAY
  4. Anger and disgust in Mexico over beheading of newly sworn-in city mayor  The Guardian
  5. After newly elected mayor is beheaded in Mexico, others ask federal authorities for protection  CBS News

item.title: North Korea wades into Ukraine - The Hill
item.description:
1. North Korea wades into Ukraine  The Hill
  2. North Koreans deployed alongside Russian troops in Ukraine, sources say  The Guardian
  3. North Korea Seen Likely to Send Troops to Ukraine to Aid Russia  Bloomberg
  4. Kremlin shrugs off reports of North Korean troops fighting in Ukraine  Euronews
  5. North Korea sends troops abroad and builds walls at home  GZERO Media

item.title: Russia has suffered more casualties in Ukraine war than all other conflicts combined since WWII: Pentagon - Fox News
item.description:
1. Russia has suffered more casualties in Ukraine war than all other conflicts combined since WWII: Pentagon  Fox News
  2. Russia Lost 1140 Troops, 59 Artillery Systems, and 70 drones in a day: Kyiv  Newsweek
  3. September Was Deadly Month for Russian Troops in Ukraine, U.S. Says  The New York Times
  4. Russia has suffered more than 600K casualties in Ukraine, US official says  The Hill
  5. Russia is set to lose over 1,000 troops a day through the winter as it fights a war on three fronts: UK MOD  Business Insider
